about_the_game:
About Space Travellers Game

Space Travellers is a unique open-world sandbox space simulator. You have complete freedom of decision and movement. You can travel to familiar places in the Solar System and adjacent systems, or explore over 6000 unexplored distant worlds.

All planets can be landed on and explored. Explore the universe, there are plenty of adventures waiting for you! Travel planets, cities, trade, fight, build factories and bases, colonise. You will also encounter alien life forms and experience many dangers.

History

The year is 2343. War has engulfed virtually the entire known galaxy. The entire free world has banded together to confront the ever-expanding aggressor, formed years ago by the merger of several major multinational corporations into a new state entity: the Holy Empire, headed by the Emperor. After the initial military successes of the Imperium, the forces have gradually become more evenly matched and everything is heading towards a long indecisive war. Until a mysterious new weapon is discovered that threatens the entire planet Earth.

Embark on an odyssey through the universe

Explore the universe, from our Solar System to 6 000 other planets. Discover barren moons and futuristic cities, witness black holes and anomalies as you roam among the stars.

Command spacecraft in thrilling space battles

Embark on lucrative military missions to earn your fortune, or venture to distant planets to hunt exotic creatures and unearth new life forms.

Master interstellar commerce

Forge alliances with over 30 nations and corporations as you build your reputation as a formidable trader. Upgrade your arsenal, sell new materials and earn a fortune.

Shape the universe

Establish thriving colonies and erect factories to sustain your prosperity. Delve into the depths of space to mine both known and mysterious materials.

Experience the universe in your own way

  • Fly freely in the entire universe
  • Explore Solar System and 6000 other planets
  • Land and walk on any planet or star
  • See black holes and other space anomalies
  • Visit futuristic cities and bases
  • Colonize and terraform planets
  • Build factories to sustain your income
  • Mine and sell know and unknow materials
  • Earn money with military missions
  • Fight in space with hostile vessels
  • Hunt animals and new life forms on distant planets
  • Trade with more than 30 nations and corporations
  • Build your reputation
  • Buy new space ships and weapons
  • Create relationships with others

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-2600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Every basic graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 36 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700 or equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 36 MB available space
